package.name: Moii_Pinterest
package.summary: This extension is the easiest way to add a Pinterest Pin it button to your product page! Pinterest is becoming a significant source of traffic for retailers, more than Google+
package.description:
This extension is the easiest way to add a Pinterest Pin it button to your product page! Pinterest is becoming a significant source of traffic for retailers, more than Google+ Features:
Enable/Disable Extension Horizontal, vertical pin count or button only Display Price for pinterest gifts Uses Products Description for the Pin Description Uses the Products Base Image for the Pin image Pin the Product URL Show with other social network buttons
package.notes: - Fixed some bugs. - Added support for Magento Connect 1 - Added the possibility to have the price only when the item is on special price. - If no description is on the product, only the product name will appear. - Fixed a bug where the image was not working on all Magento version.
